channel.title: Post Mortem 718! New Server!

[CENTER][IMG]http://s1.postimg.org/imqgyimof/cooltext141955325725401.png[/img][/CENTER]
[SIZE=5]Post Mortem is a brand new 718 Rsps with 24/7 uptime and Ddos Protection.[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]PvM Based server with a stable Economy. (however skilling and pvp remain profitable) [/SIZE] [SIZE=5]15 Bosses All containing a 3% drop rate for a Boss Pet[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Vorago Has been Added with Custom Combat Script[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Friendly Community![/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Fully Working Clan System[/SIZE] [SIZE=5]Xp Modes! (harder the xp mode, higher the drop rate)[/SIZE]

item.title: Post Mortem 718! New Server!
item.dc:creator: @fpsnipmob fpsnipmob
item.description:
@fpsnipmob wrote:

[quote=“Welliton_inc, post:10, topic:553565”][quote author=fpsnipmob link=topic=672478.msg4497355#msg4497355 date=1445118592]

You’re basically a 12 year old kid with a boosted sense of authority. You ban somebody for supposed “trolling”? Are you fking me? So basically people have to be robots and respond with “yes m’am” in order to not get banned on your server. What a joke.

Plus it looks shit.

Trolling was not the reason for ipban. And what authority? Its a GAME! Haha. How can it look like shit, when all servers look the same? the content may be a bit different than others, but they are the same graphics.
[/quote]

I am aware that 99.99% of servers are garbage. But you recognise that your server is a generic piece of trash too, but you do nothing about it?[/quote]

That is your opinion, if you want to fourm that from one players post, then i hope you find a server to play. however, i take pride with the work/time i’ve put into my server. I have added some custom content, however i have not changed the graphics, which is what i was saying in my last reply. :rolleyes:

Read full topic

item.title: Post Mortem 718! New Server!
item.dc:creator: @fpsnipmob fpsnipmob
item.description:
@fpsnipmob wrote:

[quote=“Hagoromo, post:2, topic:553565”]Problem #1:
Very disrespectful player(s).

A player or “penisalorum” by the name of “KDot” was mocking me for typing with a more advanced vocabulary and was speaking complete bunkum on how he had A+'s in college for passing English. He quote on quote told me “You’re going to end up in a mental institution”. I didn’t like that at all; A person with that much anger problems telling me to play the server is more stupid than you think.

Your milk was probably poisoned for you to have such a foul manner like that.

Problem #2:
The owner (Madara) has IPBAN me from the server after watching the whole incident that went down.

Which means immaturity of authority and as well favoritism.
Which is very blunt of you to do that. :palm:

This server is a no-go for any who would like to play this “server”.

Goodluck with server :D[/quote]

You were trolling the server. Broke several rules. Yes, Kdot was out of line and has been Muted 48 hours because of it. But i take Trolling very seriously.

Read full topic

item.title: Post Mortem 718! New Server!
item.dc:creator: @Hagoromo Hagoromo
item.description:
@Hagoromo wrote:

Problem #1:
Very disrespectful player(s).

A player or “cockalorum” by the name of “KDot” was mocking me for typing with a more advanced vocabulary and was speaking complete bunkum on how he had A+'s in college for passing English. He quote on quote told me “You’re going to end up in a mental institution”. I didn’t like that at all; A person with that much anger problems telling me to play the server is more stupid than you think.

Your milk was probably poisoned for you to have such a foul manner like that.

Problem #2:
The owner (Madara) has IPBAN me from the server after watching the whole incident that went down.

Which means immaturity of authority and as well favoritism.
Which is very blunt of you to do that. :palm:

This server is a no-go for any who would like to play this “server”.

Goodluck with server
